headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BARTOS, MICHAEL VOICE

snippet: BARTOS--Michael Voice, on March 18. Born in New York City on May 13, 1942. Son of Martha Voice Bartos and Armand P. Bartos. Husband of Joan. Father of Peter, Catherine and John. Brother of Armand, Mary and Adam. Attended the Dalton School, Collegiate and the High School of Music and Art. Received a BMus from Indiana University School of Music and an M.A. from Brooklyn College Conservatory of Music. Conducted orchestras in New York City and Florida and recorded with the Polish National Orchestra. In later years worked in real estate sales, lastly with Douglas Elliman. Served on Board of Trustees of Kinhaven Music School. Memorial service to be held at a later date. Contribution in his memory may be made to Kinhaven (www.Kinhaven.org). 1/3

Received a BMus from Indiana University School of Music and an M.A. from Brooklyn College Conservatory of Music.
